chunk_text: CHAPTER II MISSION AND ACTIVITIES Article 5 Mission To achieve the objectives listed in Article 4, the Platform at Union level shall encourage cooperation between Member States through: (a) exchanging best practices and information; (b) developing expertise and analysis; (c) encouraging and facilitating innovative approaches to effective and efficient cross-border cooperation and evaluating experiences; (d) contributing to a horizontal understanding of matters relating to undeclared work.
